ThingDef.label: desert chicken egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: Unfertilized desert chicken egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: desert chicken egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: Fertilized desert chicken egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a chick. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
